org.sakaiproject.content.api

Interface ContentEntity

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Entity, GroupAwareEntity
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    ContentCollection, ContentCollectionEdit, ContentResource, ContentResourceEdit
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    BaseContentService.BaseCollectionEdit, BaseContentService.BaseResourceEdit, ContentEntityWrapper

    public interface ContentEntity
extends GroupAwareEntity

    • Method Detail

      • getContainingCollection

        ContentCollection getContainingCollection()
        Access this ContentEntity's containing collection. This was documented as returning null for a site collection call, but has never been the case.
        Returns:
        The containing collection, or null if this is the root collection.

      • isResource

        boolean isResource()
        Check whether an entity is a ContentResource.
        Returns:
        true if the entity implements the ContentResource interface, false otherwise.

      • isCollection

        boolean isCollection()
        Check whether an entity is a ContentCollection.
        Returns:
        true if the entity implements the ContentCollection interface, false otherwise.

      • getResourceType

        String getResourceType()
        Access the "type" of this ContentEntity, which defines which ResourceType registration defines its properties.
        Returns:

        Returns:

        ContentEntity getMember(String nextId)
        Parameters:

      • getUrl

        String getUrl(boolean relative)
        Access the URL which can be used to access the entity. Will return a relative or absolute url, depending on value of the parameter. If parameter is true, URL will be relative to the server's root. Otherwise, it will be a complete URL starting with the base URL of the server.
        Parameters:
        relative -
        Returns:
        The URL which can be used to access the resource.
